item.title: Debugging Gradle Script in IntelliJ/Android Studio
item.description: In order to debug Gradle we have to create a new remote configuration in Android Studio. Open “EditRun/Debug configurations” dialog: Don’t forget to add your break point in the build.gradle file. Once in “Run/Debug Configuration” click on the + icon to add a new configuration and then select Remote: You will be presented with the “Remote” configuration options. (Optional) rename configuration from “Unnamed” to whatever name you desire.
